title: Share of global fentanyl consumption in 2018 , by country
summary: The chart shows the Share global Country in Share by Percentage .

The Share Country with an average Percentage of 2 ° consumption is United_Kingdom , followed by United_States at 20.8 ° consumption , Other_countries at 18.4 ° consumption , then Germany at 17.5 ° consumption .
Italy is the warmest Country shown with an average Percentage of 20.8 ° consumption , closely followed by Spain at 8.2 ° consumption .
gold: This statistic displays the distribution of global fentanyl consumption by region in 2018 . During this year , the United Kingdom consumed approximately 15.6 percent of the world 's fentanyl . This drug can be used as an analgesic and is about 100 times more potent than morphine .
